balanceOf(address,uint256).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOf}. Requirements: - `account` cannot be the zero address.

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length.

onERC1155Received(address,address,uint25.details: The next 2 functions are required for ERC1155 standard

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: This function is required for ERC1155 standard

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

_toolIds.details: IDs of tools. Each one is unique

devdoc.title: This contracts represents tools that are used to mine resources and artifacts.

AddTool(uint256,string).notice: Indicates that a new tool was added

BaseURI(string).notice: Indicates that a new base URI was set

Craft(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Indicates that a tool was crafted

RecipeCreatedOrUpdated(uint256,uint256,u.notice: Indicates that tool recipe was created or updated

ToolPropertiesSet(uint256).notice: Indicates that tool type's properties have been changed

ToolRepaired(uint256).notice: Indicates that a tool has been fully repaired
